headline: Iconic Fairmont hotel owner files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy
summary: While the bankruptcies of several regional airlines have dominated the news cycle this autumn, the hospitality industry has also been rocked by market instability. The company behind hotels such as the Tuscany and Hotel 27 in New York City suddenly filed for bankruptcy and shut down operations in ...

headline: Marriott International Accelerates Branded Residential Growth in Europe, Middle East & Africa
summary: Today at the Resort and Residential Forum, Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ: MAR) ("Marriott") announced continued momentum and expansion of the company's branded residential portfolio across the Europe, Middle East & Africa (EMEA) region.

raw.headline: Marriott International Accelerates Branded Residential Growth in Europe, Middle East & Africa
raw.summary: Today at the Resort and Residential Forum, Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ: MAR) ("Marriott") announced continued momentum and expansion of the company's branded residential portfolio across the Europe, Middle East & Africa (EMEA) region.

headline: Sonder announces bankruptcy plans; tells guests to vacate hotel rooms: 'People were scrambling'
summary: Apartment rentals firm Sonder said it's liquidating operations, a day after Marriott said a licensing agreement between the two companies had ended.

raw.headline: Sonder announces bankruptcy plans; tells guests to vacate hotel rooms: 'People were scrambling'
raw.summary: Apartment rentals firm Sonder said it's liquidating operations, a day after Marriott said a licensing agreement between the two companies had ended.

headline: AvantStay Offers Support to Travelers and Building Owners Affected by Sonder Amid Marriott Termination and Chapter 7 Liquidation
summary: The recent termination of the licensing agreement between Marriott International and Sonder, as well as the subsequent initiation of a Chapter 7 liquidation of Sonder's U.S. business, signals a broader shift in the short term rental industry, defined by a growing emphasis on elite operations, world class reviews, and profitable operators. The shift highlights the importance for short term rental building owners to select partners who can deliver on an integrated holistic hospitality experience t

headline: Marriott-linked rental company to file for Chapter 7 bankruptcy and shut down, guests stranded
summary: Founded in 2014 at the ascent of the vacation rental company market, Sonder Holdings at one point managed over 9,000 apartments and homes in 40 countries around the world as it expanded beyond its origins in Montreal and eventually moved its headquarters to San Francisco.
